text: (nabiye,) parayuka: tirccayayum etearu maranattil ninn ninnal oti akalunnuvea at tirccayayum ninnalumayi kantumuttunnatanâ€Œ. pinnit adrsyavum, drsyavum ariyunnavanre atukkalekk ninnal matakkappetukayum ceyyum. appeal ninnal pravartticcukeantirikkunnatine parri avan ninnale vivaramariyikkunnatanâ€Œ
